summary: A set of example scripts that demonstrate how to use the hal-cgp library for Cartesian Genetic Programming across different scenarios, such as caching expensive fitness evaluations, performing regression with differential evolution, evolving regression models, and solving the MountainCarContinuous environment with visualization tools.
business_intent: Help developers and researchers quickly learn and adopt the hal-cgp framework by providing ready-to-run illustrations of common evolutionary computation tasks, thereby accelerating prototyping and reducing the learning curve.
